DOC.brief_summary: Due to its soft cuff easily folded to impede ProSeal LMA insertion, many tools are developed. The aim of the study is to investigate the efficiency of ProSeal LMA insertion guided by a soft, direct optical Foley airway stylet tool (FAST) and compared with the standard introducer-tool (I-Tool).
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Foley Airway Stylet Tool on Proseal LMA Insertion
DOC.criteria: 1. patients with American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status III 2. aged 2065 years 3. requiring LMA Intubation under general anesthesia 4. unlimited mouth open 5. unlimited neck motion 1. mouth open ＜ 3 cm 2. limited neck motion 3. BMI≧35 kg/m2
DOC.keyword: LMA, Foley Airway Stylet Tool (FAST), introducer-tool (I-Tool)
